00024 class SioSocketAdapter
00025 {
00026     private:
00027         enum {
00028             /* 0 .. (c_sioadapter_max_sockets - 1)                            -> server socket
00029                c_sioadapter_max_sockets .. (2 * c_sioadapter_max_sockets - 1) -> client socket
00030                else                                                           -> invalid
00031              */
00032             c_sioadapter_max_sockets = 8,
00033             c_sioadapter_invalid_sock_id = 2 * c_sioadapter_max_sockets
00034         };
00035 
00036         class SerialServerSockEventListener : public SocketEventListener {
00037             virtual void OnSocketEvent(Socket::Event event, Socket *socket);
00038         };
00039 
00040         class SerialClientSockEventListener : public SocketEventListener {
00041             virtual void OnSocketEvent(Socket::Event event, Socket *socket);
00042         };
00043         
00044         friend class SioSocketAdapter::SerialClientSockEventListener;
00045         friend class SioSocketAdapter::SerialServerSockEventListener;
00046 
00047         // Forbid construction.
00048         SioSocketAdapter();
00049         // Forbid destruction.
00050         ~SioSocketAdapter();

00058 
00059         struct SioSocketCallbacks {
00060     //      SimpleCb m_close_cnf_cb;
00061     //      SimpleCb m_listen_cnf_cb;
00062     //???       AcceptCb m_accept_cnf_cb;
00063             SimpleCb m_connect_ind_cb;       //Server only
00064             SimpleCb m_disconnect_ind_cb;
00065             SimpleCb m_connect_cnf_cb;       //Client only
00066             SimpleCb m_write_cnf_cb;         //Data successfully written
00067     //      SimpleCb m_read_cnf_cb;
00068     //      SimpleCb m_send_data_cnf_cb;
00069             SimpleCb m_data_available_ind_cb;   //You can/shall read data now
00070         };
